title: Portfolio
description: Developed a personal portfolio website using React, showcasing my software development projects, with responsive design and interactive features to enhance user experience.

title: Cafe Website
description: Built a responsive WordPress website for a local cafe, including features such as an online menu, calendar, and contact forms, and optimized it for mobile devices and search engines.

title: Task Management
description: Built a responsive task management app with React, PHP, MySQL, and AJAX for real-time updates, user authentication, and task operations.
